basic_node.title: Noise floor
basic_node.description: Variety of unintentionally measured light power impulses.
basic_node.references: [pp1, http://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/6851467/] [pp1, http://www.mdpi.com/2504-3900/2/13/852, See signal to noise ratio (SNR)] [di2, http://ascelibrary.org/doi/10.1061/%28ASCE%290733-9453%282005%29131%3A4%28135%29, See blooming. Excess charges flowing into neighboring photodiodes or pixels; creating unintentionally measured power impulses and thus; creating false positive detections.] [di2, https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/9354172/] [di2, http://link.springer.com/10.1007/978-3-319-66787-4, Raised noise floor due to saturation/blending security attack might reach detection threshold. See p.457]
